Package Tools

Class CustomColours

java.lang.Object
Tools.CustomColours
public class CustomColours extends Object
This UI help class is used for us to have access to the Apple defined colors for software development.
Author:
Michail Panagiotis Bofos, Demetra Hadjicosti, Ioanna Theofilou, Lucía Jiménez García
